title: TFW you are playing Graves and you see a 4-man gank coming at you.

replies.body: What is that in his mouth? Looks dangerous
I don't want my child seeing something vulgar like that

In my country that doesn't exist, these things are bad for everyone in society, so they practically don't exist as well.

Although it's perfectly okay to gouge out someone's eyeballs with a bird.
Or launch a thermonuclear weapon at them
Or eat them whole
Or mercilessly gun them down with a manic smile on your face
Or cause them to slowly bleed to death after slicing them in half with a humongous axe
Or spit and vomit on them until they die
Or use a giant scorpion to physically impale them and drag them away from help
Or use a sword specifically designed to use magic based on other peoples' blood
Or become a pool of blood if you wanted
Or use a giant crossbow to temporarily impale enemies to a wall
Or burn a little girl alive
Or have the little girl burn you alive
Or have a heat-seeking acidic sword-missile hit you over and over again
Or have a gigantic shark eat them
Or get drunk as hell and heavily endorse alcohol
Or brutally murder pacifistic river creatures just for personal gain
Or get chased down by a bear and have a chunk ripped out of you
Or throw spears at people then turn into a cougar to maul them to death
Or use chemical weapons and poison to slowly tear apart your enemies
Or have your soul stolen by a green fiery skeleton man with a lantern
Or create and spread a much more visible but more immediately lethal version of AIDS
Or kill a certain person and use their head as a trophy

And probably a couple of other things we're perfectly okay with. But THAT thing in that picture is totally uncalled for. I request that you take down the photo immediately and remove that terrible object from his mouth before you poison the children!
you forgot that its reasonable for drunken people that endorse alchohol to have whats in the picture. or for it to be in a video.

Oh yeah that's okay. See, the alcoholics are already ruining their lives by drinking it, so they can also continue to ruin their lives with THAT thing and it won't make a difference if their lives are ruined.

It's still okay to endorse alcohol, which is 110% logical here.

omg I'm almost crying from laughing righ tnow...who's sword uses blood though?
Either Aatrox or Bloodthirster. I'll let you decide.
Kalista can out smite Nunu and Cho, but Graves can't have a cigar?
whats that in his mouth? 2/10 poor cosplay
